favourite.article: Oh te amo, pues Tu me amas, solo quiero vivirte a Ti, y bajo Tu guiar, constante y al instante estar.... I love you Lord Jesus, because You love me!!!
You've called me and saved me and, Lord, preserved me. You have brought me, Lord, to this day. I love You, dear Lord.
Lord we want to be under Your instant moment by moment leading! Thank you Lord for the Law of the Spirit of Life!
Lord I have set my heart, Lord I desire only You. Keep drawing me and my fellow brothers and sisters-the saints, draw us, we will run after You.
Lord, You are my Savior and I'm so glad I came to Your path. This song inspires me.
